String.string: Dangerous creatures are swarming just across the bridge!
It is good to know Edan is safe.
Fight off prowling cromoses in the area near the Tainted Gorge Bridge.
Be on the lookout for Phaedra in the Tainted Gorge.
Kill devoted ebon imps and dark raiders infesting the Tainted Gorge.
Retrieve expedition amulets from fallen soldiers.
Take the amulets to Sersine at the Tainted Gorge Outpost.
